name: WP Topvotes
author: Stephan Ahlf

sections.description: This service allows your visitors to vote for your website. It is easy to integrate the service into your web pages. There is no own webspace needed. Where’s the difference? The difference to other voting services is that every user can vote. The users do not need an account to submit their votes.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload files to the /wp-content/plugins/wp-topvotes/ directory.

  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

    Take a look at the Screenshots to see the results.
sections.faq:
FAQ

To read Topvotes FAQ please visit http://topvotes.appspot.com/faq
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • Fixed display bug on homepage aka startpage.

    • 1.0

  • Initial import.

short_description: This Plugin let the visitor vote your site via a simple widget like the facebook "I like this" button.
description: This service allows your visitors to vote for your website. It is easy to integrate the service into your web pages. There is no own webspace needed. Where’s the difference? The difference to other voting services is that every user can vote. The users do not need an account to submit their votes.
